View reports for

## Prerequisites

This topic applies to model validators and executives who wants to get a quick overview for findings related to model validation, including the severity of these findings.

## Steps

1. [Log in to the ValidMind UI]({{< var vm_ui >}}).

2. In the left sidebar, click **Reports**.

   In the Reports page that opens, you can see bar charts for different types of findings, including:

   - Findings by risk area
   - Findings by business 
   - Findings by status
   - Findings by model
